title: How to unsubscribe from Claude
description: Here's how to cancel your Claude subscription, depending on where you signed up.

web.title: Cancel Subscription via Web Browser
web.description:
To cancel your Claude subscription via a web browser:

*   Log in to your Claude account on a web browser or open the desktop app.
*   Click on your initials or name in the lower-left corner and select “Settings” from the menu.
*   Navigate to Settings > Billing and click the “Cancel” button.
*   Provide a reason for cancellation and confirm.

android_app.title: Cancel Subscription via Android App
android_app.description:
To cancel your Claude subscription via the Android app:

*   Click on your initials in the top right corner of the Claude app for Android, and then click “Billing” from the menu options.
*   Select “Manage subscription” and follow the prompts for cancellation.
*   If you've already removed the app, follow the Google Play Store instructions to unsubscribe: Cancel, pause, or change a subscription on Google Play.

ios_app.title: Cancel Subscription via iOS App
ios_app.description:
To cancel your Claude subscription via the iOS app:

*   Click on your initials in the top right corner of Claude for iOS, and then click “Billing” from the menu options.
*   Select “Manage subscription” and follow the prompts for cancellation.
*   If you want to cancel a subscription from Apple, follow the App Store instructions to unsubscribe: If you want to cancel a subscription from Apple.
